Introduction to HIV/AIDS

Free translation achieved from the english HIV/AIDS articles to portuguese language: These translations were made with permission of Article:

  • Script (en) “HIV and AIDS_Prevention for Positives” (ptBR) "HIV e AIDS_Prevenção para Soro-positivos."

Text translation from the English original " HIV and AIDS_Prevention will be make positive " of the AIDSvideos.org.translation series. The article brings important informations for positives as how to keep on living with health, get a better life, and make possible that disease does not continue doing victims. Proceedings, risks, and helping are also contents of this article. See articles http: // aidsvideos.org/translate.shtml.

Article:
  • Script (en) “Better Adherence for a Better Life!" (ptBR)"Melhor aderência para uma vida melhor".

Free translation to Portuguese language from script “Better Adherence for a Better Life!”. This work was achieved in contribution with Eric Krock IDSvideo.org. This article clarifies why it's so important for HIV positive people to take their antiretroviral medications (ARVs).
It also talks about the importance of the prescribed schedules. The article directions represent a dialog between the position of the infected person and his adhesion to a program of health that can always bring him a condition of healthy life. The Portuguese version is named "Melhor aderência para uma vida melhor".
See: http://aidsvideos.org/translate.shtml

Article:
  • Script (en) “Crystal Methamphetamine and HIV: The Connection.” (ptBR) “Cristal de Metanfetamina e HIV: A Conexão".

Translation achieved to the Portuguese language intitled “Cristal de Metanfetamina e HIV: A Conexão.” The article discuss the history of crystal methamphetamine and its impact on the spread of HIV/AIDS. It clarifies why the Crystal causes so destruction in the human body, its effetcs on the brain, how it can increase the spreading of HIV, and how to get treatment program. See articles http://www.aidsvideos.org/translate.shtml.

Article:
  • Script (en) “Did I Just Contract HIV? Symptoms of Primary HIV Infection.” (ptBR) “Eu contraí o HIV? Sintomas primários de infecção do HIV".

Translation into the Portuguese language from the english original article "Did I Just Contract HIV?" The matter is how is possible to recognize when a person recently contracted HIV . This translation is a script for a video that will teach people how to recognize signs and symptoms of primary HIV infection. See articles http: // aidsvideos.org/translate.shtml

This first article entittled in portuguese as Introdução ao HIV_AIDS is already edited on vídeo.
